trans-unit.source: This variable is specified on the command line when cross-compiling with CMake. It is the path to a file which is read early in the CMake run and which specifies locations for compilers and toolchain utilities, and other target platform and compiler related information.
trans-unit.target: 当与 CMake 交叉编译时,这个变量是在命令行中指定的,它是一个文件的路径,这个文件在 CMake 运行的早期就被读取了,它指定了编译器和工具链实用程序的位置,以及其他目标平台和编译器相关信息。它是一个文件的路径,在CMake运行的早期就被读取,它指定了编译器和工具链实用程序的位置,以及其他目标平台和编译器相关信息。

trans-unit.source: This variable is the Debug variant of the CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG> variable.
trans-unit.target: 该变量是 Debug 所述的变体 CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG> 变量。

trans-unit.source: This variable is the Debug variant of the CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG>_INIT variable.
trans-unit.target: 该变量是 Debug 所述的变体 CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG>_INIT 变量。

trans-unit.source: This variable is the MinSizeRel variant of the CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG> variable.
trans-unit.target: 此变量是 CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG> 变量的 MinSizeRel 变体。

trans-unit.source: This variable is the MinSizeRel variant of the CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG>_INIT variable.
trans-unit.target: 该变量是 MinSizeRel 所述的变体 CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG>_INIT 变量。

trans-unit.source: This variable is the RelWithDebInfo variant of the CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG> variable.
trans-unit.target: 此变量是 CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG> 变量的 RelWithDebInfo 变体。

trans-unit.source: This variable is the RelWithDebInfo variant of the CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG>_INIT variable.
trans-unit.target: 此变量是 CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG>_INIT 变量的 RelWithDebInfo 变体。

trans-unit.source: This variable is the Release variant of the CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG> variable.
trans-unit.target: 此变量是 CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG> 变量的 Release 版本。

trans-unit.source: This variable is the Release variant of the CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG>_INIT variable.
trans-unit.target: 此变量是 CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG>_INIT 变量的 Release 变体。

trans-unit.source: This variable is the composite of CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_NAME and CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_VERSION, e.g. ${CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_NAME}-${CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_VERSION}. If CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_VERSION is not set, then this variable is the same as CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_NAME.
trans-unit.target: 此变量是 CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_NAME 和 CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_VERSION 的组合，例如 ${CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_NAME}-${CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_VERSION} 。如果未设置 CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_VERSION ，则此变量与 CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_NAME 相同。

trans-unit.source: This variable is the composite of CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME and CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION, e.g. ${CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME}-${CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION}. If CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION is not set, then this variable is the same as CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME.
trans-unit.target: 此变量是 CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME 和 CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION 的组合，例如 ${CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME}-${CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION} 。如果未设置 CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION ，则此变量与 CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME 相同。

trans-unit.source: This variable is the same as CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR if you build for the host system instead of the target system when cross compiling.
trans-unit.target: 如果在交叉编译时是为主机系统而不是目标系统构建的，则此变量与 CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR 相同。

trans-unit.source: This variable is used by CMake-generated cmake_install.cmake scripts. If one sets this variable to ON while running the script, it may get warning messages from the script.
trans-unit.target: CMake生成的 cmake_install.cmake 脚本使用此变量。如果在运行脚本时将此变量设置为 ON ，则它可能会从脚本中获得警告消息。

trans-unit.source: This variable is used to initialize the UNITY_BUILD property of targets when they are created. Setting it to true enables batch compilation of multiple sources within each target. This feature is known as a Unity or Jumbo build.
trans-unit.target: 创建目标时，此变量用于初始化目标的 UNITY_BUILD 属性。将其设置为true可以在每个目标中批量编译多个源。此功能称为Unity或Jumbo构建。

trans-unit.source: This variable is used to initialize the UNITY_BUILD_BATCH_SIZE property of targets when they are created. It specifies the default upper limit on the number of source files that may be combined in any one unity source file when unity builds are enabled for a target.
trans-unit.target: 创建目标时，此变量用于初始化目标的 UNITY_BUILD_BATCH_SIZE 属性。它为目标启用了统一构建时，指定了可以在任何一个统一源文件中合并的源文件数的默认上限。

trans-unit.source: This variable is used to initialize the UNITY_BUILD_UNIQUE_ID property of targets when they are created. It specifies the name of the unique identifier generated per file in a unity build.
This variable is used to initialize the VS_JUST_MY_CODE_DEBUGGING property on all targets when they are created. See that target property for additional information.
trans-unit.target: 创建所有目标时，此变量用于初始化 VS_JUST_MY_CODE_DEBUGGING 属性。有关其他信息，请参见该目标属性。

trans-unit.source: This variable is used to initialize the XCODE_LINK_BUILD_PHASE_MODE property on targets. It affects the methods that the Xcode generator uses to link different kinds of libraries. Its default value is NONE.
trans-unit.target: 此变量用于在目标上初始化 XCODE_LINK_BUILD_PHASE_MODE 属性。它影响 Xcode 生成器用来链接不同种类的库的方法。其默认值为 NONE 。

trans-unit.source: This variable may be useful when a developer has compiled a custom version of a common library and wishes to link it to a dependent project. If this variable is set to TRUE, it would prevent a dependent project’s call to find_package() from selecting the default library located by the system’s Find<pkg>.cmake module before finding the developer’s custom built library.
trans-unit.target: 当开发人员已编译公共库的自定义版本并希望将其链接到从属项目时，此变量可能很有用。如果此变量设置为 TRUE ，则它将防止从属项目对 find_package() 的调用选择系统的 Find<pkg>.cmake 模块位于的默认库，然后再查找开发人员的自定义生成的库。

trans-unit.source: This variable may be useful when a developer has compiled a custom version of a common library and wishes to link it to a dependent project. If this variable is set to TRUE, it would prevent a dependent project's call to find_package() from selecting the default library located by the system's Find<pkg>.cmake module before finding the developer's custom built library.
This variable may hold a single prefix or a semicolon-separated list of multiple prefixes.
trans-unit.target: 该变量可以包含一个前缀或多个前缀的分号分隔列表。

trans-unit.source: This variable may hold a single prefix or a list of prefixes separated by : on UNIX or ; on Windows (the same as the PATH environment variable convention on those platforms).

trans-unit.source: This variable may only be set in a toolchain file specified by the CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE variable.

trans-unit.source: This variable serves the same purpose during packaging as the CMAKE_INSTALL_DEFAULT_DIRECTORY_PERMISSIONS variable serves during installation (e.g. make install).

trans-unit.source: This variable should not be set by a project in CMake code. Project developers running CMake may set this variable in their cache to enable the warning (e.g. -DCMAKE_POLICY_WARNING_CMP<NNNN>=ON). Alternatively, running cmake(1) with the --debug-output, --trace, or --trace-expand option will also enable the warning.
trans-unit.target: 该变量不应由项目在CMake代码中设置。运行CMake的项目开发人员可以在其缓存中设置此变量以启用警告（例如 -DCMAKE_POLICY_WARNING_CMP<NNNN>=ON ）。或者，使用 --debug-output ，-- --trace 或 --trace-expand 选项运行 cmake(1) 也将启用警告。

trans-unit.source: This variable should not be set by a project in CMake code; use cmake_policy(SET) instead. Users running CMake may set this variable in the cache (e.g. -DCMAKE_POLICY_DEFAULT_CMP<NNNN>=<OLD|NEW>) to set a policy not otherwise set by the project. Set to OLD to quiet a policy warning while using old behavior or to NEW to try building the project with new behavior.
trans-unit.target: 该变量不应由项目使用CMake代码设置；使用 cmake_policy(SET) 代替。运行CMake的用户可以在缓存中设置此变量（例如 -DCMAKE_POLICY_DEFAULT_CMP<NNNN>=<OLD|NEW> ）以设置项目未另行设置的策略。设置为 OLD 可以在使用旧行为时静默策略警告，或者设置为 NEW 可以尝试使用新行为构建项目。

trans-unit.source: This variable should not be set by project code. It is meant to be set by CMake’s platform information modules for the current toolchain, or by a toolchain file when used with CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE.
trans-unit.target: 此变量不应由项目代码设置。它是由CMake的当前工具链的平台信息模块或与 CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE 一起使用的工具链文件设置的。

trans-unit.source: This variable should not be set by project code. It is meant to be set by CMake's platform information modules for the current toolchain, or by a toolchain file when used with CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE.

trans-unit.source: This variable triggers the definition of CMAKE_WARN_ON_ABSOLUTE_INSTALL_DESTINATION when CPack runs cmake_install.cmake scripts.
trans-unit.target: 当CPack运行 cmake_install.cmake 脚本时，此变量将触发 CMAKE_WARN_ON_ABSOLUTE_INSTALL_DESTINATION 的定义。

trans-unit.source: This variable will be set to true by CMake if the CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME variable has been set manually (i.e. in a toolchain file or as a cache entry from the cmake command line). In most cases, manually setting CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME will only be done when cross compiling, since it will otherwise be given the same value as CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_NAME if not manually set, which is correct for the non-cross-compiling case. In the event that CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME is manually set to the same value as CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_NAME, then CMAKE_CROSSCOMPILING will still be set to true.
trans-unit.target: 如果已手动设置 CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME 变量（即在工具链文件中或作为 cmake 命令行的缓存条目），则CMake会将此变量设置为true 。在大多数情况下，只有在交叉编译时才手动设置 CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME ，因为如果不手动设置，将获得与 CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_NAME 相同的值，这对于非交叉编译情况是正确的。如果将 CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME 手动设置为与 CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_NAME 相同的值，则 CMAKE_CROSSCOMPILING 仍将设置为true。

trans-unit.source: This variable will only be defined if ctest(1) has been given a --resource-spec-file, or if ctest_test() has been given a RESOURCE_SPEC_FILE. If no resource specification file has been given, this variable will not be defined.
trans-unit.target: 仅当 ctest(1) 一个 --resource-spec-file 或给 ctest_test() 一个 RESOURCE_SPEC_FILE 时，才定义此变量。如果未提供资源规范文件，则不会定义此变量。

trans-unit.source: This will also be used to display a weighted test timing result in label and subproject summaries in the command line output of ctest(1). trans-unit.source: This will check that the REQUIRED_VARS contain values (that do not end in -NOTFOUND) and set Foo_FOUND appropriately. It will also cache those values. If Foo_VERSION is set, and a required version was passed to find_package(), it will check the requested version against the one in Foo_VERSION. It will also print messages as appropriate; note that if the package was found, it will print the contents of the first required variable to indicate where it was found.
trans-unit.target: 这将检查 REQUIRED_VARS 是否包含值（以 -NOTFOUND 结尾的值），并适当地设置 Foo_FOUND 。它还将缓存这些值。如果 Foo_VERSION 设置，并且所需的版本传递给 find_package() ,它会检查对一个在请求的版本 Foo_VERSION 。它还将适当地打印消息；请注意，如果找到该程序包，它将打印第一个必需变量的内容以指示在哪里找到了它。

trans-unit.source: This will store in <var> a semicolon-separated list in which the first element is the name of the command to be called, and the remaining elements are its unevaluated arguments (any contained ; characters are included literally and cannot be distinguished from multiple arguments). If multiple calls are scheduled with the same id, this retrieves the first one. If no call is scheduled with the given id in the specified DIRECTORY scope (or the current directory scope if no DIRECTORY option is given), this stores an empty string in the variable.

This will store in <var> a semicolon-separated list in which the first element is the name of the command to be called, and the remaining elements are its unevaluated arguments (any contained ; characters are included literally and cannot be distinguished from multiple arguments). If multiple calls are scheduled with the same id, this retrieves the first one. If no call is scheduled with the given id, this stores an empty string in the variable.
trans-unit.target: 这将在 <var> 中存储一个以分号分隔的列表，其中第一个元素是要调用的命令的名称，其余元素是其未求值的参数（任何包含的内容 ; 字符按字面意义包含且不能与多个参数区分开）。如果安排了多个具有相同ID的呼叫，则将检索第一个。如果没有使用给定的ID安排任何呼叫，则此操作将在变量中存储一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: This will store in <var> a semicolon-separated list of deferred call ids.
trans-unit.target: 这将存储在 <var> 一个分号分隔的列表推迟呼叫ID的。

trans-unit.source: This will store in <var> a semicolon-separated list of deferred call ids. The ids are for the directory scope in which the calls have been deferred to (i.e. where they will be executed), which can be different to the scope in which they were created. The DIRECTORY option can be used to specify the scope for which to retrieve the call ids. If that option is not given, the call ids for the current directory scope will be returned.
This will store the opposite of IS_ABSOLUTE in <out-var>.

This works well for all generators except Ninja. The Ninja build tool sees a rule listing byproduct.txt as a dependency and no rule listing it as an output. Ninja then complains that there is no way to satisfy the dependency and stops building even though there are order-only dependencies that ensure byproduct.txt will exist before its consumers need it. See discussion of this problem in Ninja Issue 760 for further details on why Ninja works this way.
trans-unit.target: 这对 Ninja 以外的所有发电机都适用。Ninja构建工具将规则列表 byproduct.txt 视为依赖项，而没有规则将其列表作为输出。Ninja然后抱怨说，即使有仅订购的依赖关系也无法确保满足依赖关系，并且停止构建，以确保 byproduct.txt 在其消费者需要它之前就已经存在。有关为何忍者以这种方式工作的更多详细信息，请参见《忍者问题760》中有关此问题的讨论。

trans-unit.source: This works well for all generators except Ninja. The Ninja build tool sees a rule listing byproduct.txt as a dependency and no rule listing it as an output. Ninja then complains that there is no way to satisfy the dependency and stops building even though there are order-only dependencies that ensure byproduct.txt will exist before its consumers need it. See discussion of this problem in Ninja Issue 760 for further details on why Ninja works this way.
trans-unit.target: 这对 Ninja 以外的所有发电机都适用。Ninja构建工具将规则列表 byproduct.txt 视为依赖项，而没有规则将其列表作为输出。Ninja随后抱怨说，即使有仅订购的依赖关系也无法确保满足依赖关系，并且停止构建，以确保 byproduct.txt 在其消费者需要之前存在。有关忍者为何以这种方式工作的更多详细信息，请参见《忍者》第760期中有关此问题的讨论。

trans-unit.source: This works well for all generators except Ninja. The Ninja build tool sees a rule listing byproduct.txt as a dependency and no rule listing it as an output. Ninja then complains that there is no way to satisfy the dependency and stops building even though there are order-only dependencies that ensure byproduct.txt will exist before its consumers need it. See discussion of this problem in Ninja Issue 760 for further details on why Ninja works this way.

trans-unit.source: To determine the link language of a target, it is required to collect, transitively, all the targets which will be linked to it. So, for link libraries properties, a double evaluation will be done. During the first evaluation, $<LINK_LANGUAGE:..> expressions will always return 0. The link language computed after this first pass will be used to do the second pass. To avoid inconsistency, it is required that the second pass do not change the link language. Moreover, to avoid unexpected side-effects, it is required to specify complete entities as part of the $<LINK_LANGUAGE:..> expression. For example:
trans-unit.target: 为了确定目标的链接语言，需要以传递方式收集将与之链接的所有目标。因此，对于链接库属性，将进行两次评估。在第一次求值期间， $<LINK_LANGUAGE:..> 表达式将始终返回 0 。在第一遍之后计算出的链接语言将用于第二遍。为了避免不一致，要求第二遍不要更改链接语言。此外，为避免意外的副作用，需要在 $<LINK_LANGUAGE:..> 表达式中指定完整的实体。例如：

trans-unit.source: To generate the path prefix, CMake tests if the header compiled by moc is in any of the target include directories. If so, CMake will compute the relative path accordingly. trans-unit.source: To pass options to the linker tool, each compiler driver has is own syntax. The LINKER: prefix can be used to specify, in a portable way, options to pass to the linker tool. The LINKER: prefix is replaced by the required driver option and the rest of the option string defines linker arguments using , as separator. These arguments will be formatted according to the CMAKE_<LANG>_LINKER_WRAPPER_FLAG and CMAKE_<LANG>_LINKER_WRAPPER_FLAG_SEP variables.
trans-unit.target: 为了将选项传递给链接器工具，每个编译器驱动程序都有自己的语法。该 LINKER: 前缀可用于指定，在便携的方式，选择传递给连接器的工具。的 LINKER: 前缀由所需的驱动程序选项及其字符串定义接头使用参数的其余部分取代 , 如隔板。这些参数将根据 CMAKE_<LANG>_LINKER_WRAPPER_FLAG 和 CMAKE_<LANG>_LINKER_WRAPPER_FLAG_SEP 变量进行格式化。

trans-unit.source: To pass options to the linker tool, each compiler driver has its own syntax. The LINKER: prefix and , separator can be used to specify, in a portable way, options to pass to the linker tool. LINKER: is replaced by the appropriate driver option and , by the appropriate driver separator. The driver prefix and driver separator are given by the values of the CMAKE_<LANG>_LINKER_WRAPPER_FLAG and CMAKE_<LANG>_LINKER_WRAPPER_FLAG_SEP variables.
trans-unit.target: 为了将选项传递给链接器工具，每个编译器驱动程序都有其自己的语法。该 LINKER: 前缀和 , 分离器可用于指定，在便携的方式，选择传递给连接器的工具。 LINKER: 由相应的驱动程序选项替换 , 由相应的驱动程序分隔符替换。驱动程序前缀和驱动程序分隔符由 CMAKE_<LANG>_LINKER_WRAPPER_FLAG 和 CMAKE_<LANG>_LINKER_WRAPPER_FLAG_SEP 变量的值给出。

trans-unit.source: To prevent ambiguity, potential variable or keyword names can be specified in a Quoted Argument or a Bracket Argument. A quoted or bracketed variable or keyword will be interpreted as a string and not dereferenced or interpreted. See policy CMP0054.
trans-unit.target: 为避免歧义，可以在带引号的参数或括号的参数中指定潜在的变量或关键字名称。带引号或方括号的变量或关键字将被解释为字符串，而不会被取消引用或解释。请参阅策略 CMP0054 。

trans-unit.source: To prevent precompile headers from being used when compiling a specific source file, see the SKIP_PRECOMPILE_HEADERS source file property.
trans-unit.target: 为防止在编译特定源文件时使用预编译头，请参见 SKIP_PRECOMPILE_HEADERS 源文件属性。

trans-unit.source: To prevent users being overwhelmed with settings to configure, try to keep as many options as possible out of the cache, leaving at least one option which can be used to disable use of the module, or locate a not-found library (e.g. Xxx_ROOT_DIR). For the same reason, mark most cache options as advanced. For packages which provide both debug and release binaries, it is common to create cache variables with a _LIBRARY_<CONFIG> suffix, such as Foo_LIBRARY_RELEASE and Foo_LIBRARY_DEBUG.
trans-unit.target: 为了防止用户不满意要配置的设置，请尝试将尽可能多的选项保留在缓存之外，至少保留一个可用于禁用模块使用的选项，或者找到一个未找到的库（例如 Xxx_ROOT_DIR ） 。出于相同的原因，请将大多数缓存选项标记为高级。对于同时提供调试和发布二进制文件的软件包，通常会创建带有 _LIBRARY_<CONFIG> 后缀的缓存变量，例如 Foo_LIBRARY_RELEASE 和 Foo_LIBRARY_DEBUG 。

trans-unit.source: To prevent users being overwhelmed with settings to configure, try to keep as many options as possible out of the cache, leaving at least one option which can be used to disable use of the module, or locate a not-found library (e.g. Xxx_ROOT_DIR). For the same reason, mark most cache options as advanced. For packages which provide both debug and release binaries, it is common to create cache variables with a _LIBRARY_<CONFIG> suffix, such as Foo_LIBRARY_RELEASE and Foo_LIBRARY_DEBUG. The SelectLibraryConfigurations module can be helpful for such cases.

trans-unit.source: Try compiling a <srcfile>. Returns TRUE or FALSE for success or failure in <compileResultVar>. If the compile succeeded, runs the executable and returns its exit code in <runResultVar>. If the executable was built, but failed to run, then <runResultVar> will be set to FAILED_TO_RUN. See the try_compile() command for information on how the test project is constructed to build the source file.
trans-unit.target: 尝试编译 <srcfile> 。对于 <compileResultVar> 中的成功或失败，返回 TRUE 或 FALSE 。如果编译成功，则运行可执行文件并在 <runResultVar> 中返回其退出代码。如果可执行文件已生成，但无法运行，则 <runResultVar> 将设置为 FAILED_TO_RUN 。有关如何构造测试项目以构建源文件的信息，请参见 try_compile() 命令。

trans-unit.source: Try to rebase the current branch to the one specified by GIT_TAG. If there are local uncommitted changes, they will be stashed first and popped again after rebasing. If rebasing or popping stashed changes fail, abort the rebase and halt with an error. When GIT_REMOTE_UPDATE_STRATEGY is not present, this is the default strategy unless the default has been overridden with CMAKE_EP_GIT_REMOTE_UPDATE_STRATEGY (see below).

Unescaped double-quotes must balance, may not appear at the beginning of an unquoted argument, and are treated as part of the content. For example, the unquoted arguments -Da="b c", -Da=$(v), and a" "b"c"d are each interpreted literally. They may instead be written as quoted arguments "-Da=\"b c\"", "-Da=$(v)", and "a\" \"b\"c\"d", respectively.
trans-unit.target: 未转义的双引号必须保持平衡，不能出现在未引号的参数的开头，并且应视为内容的一部分。例如，未加引号的参数 -Da="b c" ，- -Da=$(v) 和 a" "b"c"d 均按字面意义进行解释。相反，它们可以分别写为带引号的参数 "-Da=\"b c\"" ， "-Da=$(v)" 和 "a\" \"b\"c\"d" 。

Unlike the case of an upstream-provided package configuration file, no single point of reference identifies the package as being found, so the <PackageName>_FOUND variable is not automatically set by the find_package() command. It can still be expected to be set by convention however and should be set by the author of the Find-module. Similarly there is no <PackageName>_DIR variable, but each of the artifacts such as library locations and header file locations provide a separate cache variable.
trans-unit.target: 与上游提供的程序包配置文件不同，没有单个参考点标识已找到该程序包，因此 <PackageName>_FOUND 变量不会由 find_package() 命令自动设置。但是，仍然可以期望按照约定设置它，并且应该由“查找”模块的作者设置。类似地，没有 <PackageName>_DIR 变量，但是每个工件（例如库位置和头文件位置）都提供了单独的缓存变量。

trans-unit.source: Unquoted argument content consists of all text in a contiguous block of allowed or escaped characters. Both Escape Sequences and Variable References are evaluated. The resulting value is divided in the same way Lists divide into elements. Each non-empty element is given to the command invocation as an argument. Therefore an unquoted argument may be given to a command invocation as zero or more arguments.
trans-unit.target: 未加引号的参数内容由连续的允许或转义字符块中的所有文本组成。这两个转义序列和变量引用进行评估。结果值的划分方法与列表划分元素相同。每个非空元素都作为参数提供给命令调用。因此，未引用的参数可以作为零个或多个参数提供给命令调用。

trans-unit.target: 使用要求可以更好地控制库或可执行文件的链接并包含行，同时还可以更好地控制CMake内部目标的传递属性。利用使用需求的主要命令是：

trans-unit.source: Usage requirements allow for far better control over a library or executable's link and include line while also giving more control over the transitive property of targets inside CMake. The primary commands that leverage usage requirements are:

Usage requirements are propagated by reading the INTERFACE_ variants of target properties from dependencies and appending the values to the non-INTERFACE_ variants of the operand. For example, the INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES of dependencies is read and appended to the INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES of the operand. In cases where order is relevant and maintained, and the order resulting from the target_link_libraries() calls does not allow correct compilation, use of an appropriate command to set the property directly may update the order.
trans-unit.target: 通过从依赖项读取目标属性的 INTERFACE_ 变体并将这些值附加到非 INTERFACE_ 来传播使用需求。操作数变体中。例如，读取依赖项的 INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES ，并将其附加到操作数的 INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 上。如果订单是相关的并得以维护，并且由 target_link_libraries() 调用产生的订单不允许正确编译，则使用适当的命令直接设置属性可能会更新订单。

trans-unit.source: Use the configure_package_config_file() command provided by the CMakePackageConfigHelpers to generate the package configuration file. Note that this command should be used instead of the plain configure_file() command. It helps to ensure that the resulting package is relocatable by avoiding hardcoded paths in the installed configuration file. The path given to INSTALL_DESTINATION must be the destination where the MathFunctionsConfig.cmake file will be installed. We will examine the contents of the package configuration file in the next section.
trans-unit.target: 使用 CMakePackageConfigHelpers 提供的 configure_package_config_file() 命令生成软件包配置文件。请注意，此命令应代替普通的 configure_file() 命令使用。通过避免在已安装的配置文件中使用硬编码的路径，有助于确保可重定位的程序包是可重定位的。赋予 INSTALL_DESTINATION 的路径必须是 MathFunctionsConfig.cmake 文件的安装目的地。我们将在下一部分中检查软件包配置文件的内容。

trans-unit.source: Use the if() command VERSION_LESS, VERSION_GREATER, VERSION_EQUAL, VERSION_LESS_EQUAL, or VERSION_GREATER_EQUAL operators to compare version string values against CMAKE_VERSION using a component-wise test. Version component values may be 10 or larger so do not attempt to compare version strings as floating-point numbers.
trans-unit.target: 使用 if() 命令 VERSION_LESS ， VERSION_GREATER ， VERSION_EQUAL ， VERSION_LESS_EQUAL 或 VERSION_GREATER_EQUAL 运算符将版本字符串值与 CMAKE_VERSION 使用基于组件的测试 CMAKE_VERSION进行。版本组件值可以为10或更大，因此请勿尝试将版本字符串作为浮点数进行比较。

trans-unit.source: Use the UTF-8 codepage.

trans-unit.source: Use this macro to add information about a feature with the given <name>. <enabled> contains whether this feature is enabled or not. It can be a variable or a list of conditions. <description> is a text describing the feature. The information can be displayed using feature_summary() for ENABLED_FEATURES and DISABLED_FEATURES respectively.
trans-unit.target: 使用此宏可以使用给定的 <name> 添加有关功能的信息。 <enabled> 包含是否启用此功能。它可以是变量或条件列表。 <description> 是描述功能的文本。可以使用 feature_summary() 来显示信息，用于 ENABLED_FEATURES 和 DISABLED_FEATURES 分别。

trans-unit.source: Use this macro to set up information about the named package, which can then be displayed via feature_summary(). This can be done either directly in the Find-module or in the project which uses the module after the find_package() call. The features for which information can be set are added automatically by the find_package() command.
trans-unit.target: 使用此宏可以设置有关命名包的信息，然后可以通过 feature_summary() 显示该信息。可以在 find_package() 调用之后直接在Find-module或使用该模块的项目中完成此操作。可以设置信息的功能由 find_package() 命令自动添加。

trans-unit.source: Use this module to push data needed for testing an Android device behavior onto a connected Android device. The module will accept files and libraries as well as separate destinations for each. It will create a test that loads the files into a device object store and link to them from the specified destination. The files are only uploaded if they are not already in the object store.
trans-unit.target: 使用该模块将测试Android设备行为所需的数据推送到连接的Android设备上。该模块将接受文件和库,以及每个文件和库的单独目的地。它将创建一个测试,将文件加载到设备对象存储中,并从指定的目的地链接到它们。只有当文件还没有在对象存储中时,才会被上传。

trans-unit.source: Use this module to unambiguously reference data files stored outside the source tree and fetch them at build time from arbitrary local and remote content-addressed locations. Functions provided by this module recognize arguments with the syntax DATA{<name>} as references to external data, replace them with full paths to local copies of those data, and create build rules to fetch and update the local copies.
trans-unit.target: 使用此模块可以明确引用存储在源树之外的数据文件，并在构建时从任意本地和远程内容寻址位置获取它们。此模块提供的功能将使用语法 DATA{<name>} 参数识别为对外部数据的引用，将其替换为这些数据的本地副本的完整路径，并创建构建规则以获取和更新本地副本。

trans-unit.source: Use this option in conjunction with the ctest_test PARALLEL_LEVEL option to specify that this test should not be run in parallel with any other tests.
trans-unit.target: 将此选项与ctest_test PARALLEL_LEVEL 选项结合使用，可以指定此测试不应与任何其他测试并行运行。

trans-unit.source: Using a specific git hash ensures that the main project’s own history is fully traceable to a specific point in the external project’s evolution. If a branch or tag name is used instead, then checking out a specific commit of the main project doesn’t necessarily pin the whole build to a specific point in the life of the external project. The lack of such deterministic behavior makes the main project lose traceability and repeatability.
trans-unit.target: 使用特定的git哈希可确保主项目自身的历史完全可追溯到外部项目的演变中的特定点。如果改用分支或标记名称，则签出主项目的特定提交并不一定会将整个构建固定在外部项目生命周期的特定位置。缺乏这种确定性行为会使主要项目失去可追溯性和可重复性。

trans-unit.source: Using a specific git hash ensures that the main project's own history is fully traceable to a specific point in the external project's evolution. If a branch or tag name is used instead, then checking out a specific commit of the main project doesn't necessarily pin the whole build to a specific point in the life of the external project. The lack of such deterministic behavior makes the main project lose traceability and repeatability.

trans-unit.source: Valid context names are restricted to anything that could be used as a CMake variable name. All names that begin with an underscore or the string cmake_ are also reserved for use by CMake and should not be used by projects.

trans-unit.source: Valid values are MSMPI and MPICH2. If set, only the given library will be searched for. By default, MSMPI will be preferred over MPICH2 if both are available. This also sets MPI_SKIP_COMPILER_WRAPPER to true, which may be overridden.
trans-unit.target: 有效值为 MSMPI 和 MPICH2 。如果设置，则仅搜索给定的库。默认情况下，如果两者均可用，则 MSMPI 将优先于 MPICH2 。这还会将 MPI_SKIP_COMPILER_WRAPPER 设置为 true ，这可能会被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Valid values are PerMonitor, ON, or OFF.
trans-unit.target: 有效值为 PerMonitor ， ON 或 OFF 。

trans-unit.source: Value ONLY is not supported so FIRST will be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 不支持“ ONLY 值”，因此将使用“ FIRST 。

trans-unit.source: Value used to initialize CMAKE_CUDA_ARCHITECTURES on the first configuration if it's not already defined. Subsequent runs will use the value stored in the cache.

Value used to initialize the CMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS cache entry the first time a build tree is configured. This variable is meant to be set by a toolchain file. CMake may prepend or append content to the value based on the environment and target platform.
trans-unit.target: 首次配置构建树时用于初始化 CMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS 缓存条目的值。该变量由 toolchain file 设置。CMake可以根据环境和目标平台在内容之前或之后添加内容。

trans-unit.source: Value used to initialize the CMAKE_MODULE_LINKER_FLAGS cache entry the first time a build tree is configured. This variable is meant to be set by a toolchain file. CMake may prepend or append content to the value based on the environment and target platform.
trans-unit.target: 首次配置构建树时用于初始化 CMAKE_MODULE_LINKER_FLAGS 缓存条目的值。该变量由 toolchain file 设置。CMake可以根据环境和目标平台在内容之前或之后添加内容。

trans-unit.source: Value used to initialize the CMAKE_SHARED_LINKER_FLAGS cache entry the first time a build tree is configured. This variable is meant to be set by a toolchain file. CMake may prepend or append content to the value based on the environment and target platform.
trans-unit.target: 首次配置构建树时用于初始化 CMAKE_SHARED_LINKER_FLAGS 缓存条目的值。该变量由 toolchain file 设置。CMake可以根据环境和目标平台在内容之前或之后添加内容。

trans-unit.source: Value used to initialize the CMAKE_STATIC_LINKER_FLAGS cache entry the first time a build tree is configured. This variable is meant to be set by a toolchain file. CMake may prepend or append content to the value based on the environment and target platform.
trans-unit.target: 首次配置构建树时用于初始化 CMAKE_STATIC_LINKER_FLAGS 缓存条目的值。该变量由 toolchain file 设置。CMake可以根据环境和目标平台在内容之前或之后添加内容。

trans-unit.source: Value used to initialize the CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS cache entry the first time a build tree is configured for language <LANG>. This variable is meant to be set by a toolchain file. CMake may prepend or append content to the value based on the environment and target platform.
trans-unit.target: 首次为语言 <LANG> 配置构建树时，用于初始化 CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS 缓存条目的值。该变量由 toolchain file 设置。CMake可以根据环境和目标平台在内容之前或之后添加内容。

trans-unit.source: Value used to initialize the CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS cache entry the first time a build tree is configured for language <LANG>. This variable is meant to be set by a toolchain file. CMake may prepend or append content to the value based on the environment and target platform. For example, the contents of a xxxFLAGS environment variable will be prepended, where xxx will be language-specific but not necessarily the same as <LANG> (e.g. CXXFLAGS for CXX, FFLAGS for Fortran, and so on).
trans-unit.target: 首次为语言 <LANG> 配置构建树时，用于初始化 CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS 缓存条目的值。该变量由 toolchain file 设置。 CMake可以根据环境和目标平台在内容之前或之后添加内容。例如，一个内容 xxxFLAGS 环境变量将被预先计划，其中 xxx 将语言特定的，但不一定是相同的如 <LANG> （例如 CXXFLAGS 为 CXX ， FFLAGS 为 Fortran 的，等等）。

trans-unit.source: Value used to initialize the CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG> cache entry the first time a build tree is configured for language <LANG>. This variable is meant to be set by a toolchain file. CMake may prepend or append content to the value based on the environment and target platform.
trans-unit.target: 首次为语言 <LANG> 配置构建树时，用于初始化 CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG> 缓存条目的值。该变量由 toolchain file 设置。CMake可以根据环境和目标平台在内容之前或之后添加内容。

trans-unit.target: 首次配置构建树时，用于初始化 CMAKE_MODULE_LINKER_FLAGS_<CONFIG> 高速缓存条目的值。该变量由 toolchain file 设置。CMake可以根据环境和目标平台在内容之前或之后添加内容。

trans-unit.target: 首次配置构建树时，用于初始化 CMAKE_SHARED_LINKER_FLAGS_<CONFIG> 高速缓存条目的值。该变量由 toolchain file 设置。CMake可以根据环境和目标平台在内容之前或之后添加内容。

trans-unit.source: Values are an integer number that specifies what color to use. 0 is black (you probably don’t want to use that). Others are determined by your terminal’s color support. Most (color) terminals will support at least 8 or 16 colors. Some will support up to 256 colors. The colors will likely match this chart, although the first 16 colors may match the original CGA color palette. (Many modern terminal emulators also allow their color palette, at least for the first 16 colors, to be configured by the user.)
trans-unit.target: 值是一个整数，它指定要使用的颜色。 0 为黑色（您可能不想使用它）。其他取决于终端的颜色支持。大多数（彩色）终端将支持至少8或16种颜色。有些支持多达256种颜色。尽管前16种颜色可能与原始CGA调色板匹配，但这些颜色可能与该图表匹配。 （许多现代终端仿真器还允许用户配置其调色板（至少对于前16种颜色而言）。）

trans-unit.source: Values are an integer number that specifies what color to use. 0 is black (you probably don't want to use that). Others are determined by your terminal's color support. Most (color) terminals will support at least 8 or 16 colors. Some will support up to 256 colors. The colors will likely match this chart, although the first 16 colors may match the original CGA color palette. (Many modern terminal emulators also allow their color palette, at least for the first 16 colors, to be configured by the user.)

trans-unit.source: Variable prefix in which to store conflicting dependency information. Dependencies are conflicting if two files with the same name are found in two different directories. The list of filenames that conflict are stored in <conflicting_deps_prefix>_FILENAMES. For each filename, the list of paths that were found for that filename are stored in <conflicting_deps_prefix>_<filename>.
trans-unit.target: 用于存储冲突的依赖项信息的变量前缀。如果在两个不同的目录中找到两个具有相同名称的文件，则依赖关系会发生冲突。冲突的文件名列表存储在 <conflicting_deps_prefix>_FILENAMES 中。对于每个文件名，为该文件名找到的路径列表存储在 <conflicting_deps_prefix>_<filename> 中。

trans-unit.source: Variables are the basic unit of storage in the CMake Language. Their values are always of string type, though some commands may interpret the strings as values of other types. The set() and unset() commands explicitly set or unset a variable, but other commands have semantics that modify variables as well. Variable names are case-sensitive and may consist of almost any text, but we recommend sticking to names consisting only of alphanumeric characters plus _ and -.
trans-unit.target: 变量是CMake语言中存储的基本单位。它们的值始终为字符串类型，尽管某些命令可能会将字符串解释为其他类型的值。的 set() 和 unset() 命令明确地设置或取消设置的变量，但其它的命令具有语义修改变量为好。变量名称区分大小写，并且几乎可以包含任何文本，但是我们建议坚持使用仅由字母数字字符加 _ 和 - 组成的名称。

trans-unit.source: Variables have dynamic scope. Each variable "set" or "unset" creates a binding in the current scope:

trans-unit.source: Variables of this form specify whether the Xxx module being provided is version VV of the module. There should not be more than one variable of this form set to true for a given module. For example, a module Barry might have evolved over many years and gone through a number of different major versions. Version 3 of the Barry module might set the variable Barry_VERSION_3 to true, whereas an older version of the module might set Barry_VERSION_2 to true instead. It would be an error for both Barry_VERSION_3 and Barry_VERSION_2 to both be set to true.

trans-unit.source: We do not recommend using GLOB to collect a list of source files from your source tree. If no CMakeLists.txt file changes when a source is added or removed then the generated build system cannot know when to ask CMake to regenerate. The CONFIGURE_DEPENDS flag may not work reliably on all generators, or if a new generator is added in the future that cannot support it, projects using it will be stuck. Even if CONFIGURE_DEPENDS works reliably, there is still a cost to perform the check on every rebuild.
trans-unit.target: 我们不建议使用GLOB从源代码树中收集源文件列表。如果在添加或删除源时没有CMakeLists.txt文件更改，则生成的生成系统将不知道何时要求CMake重新生成。该 CONFIGURE_DEPENDS 标志可能不会在所有发电机可靠地工作，或者是否有新的发电机在未来补充说，不能支持它，使用它的项目将被卡住。即使 CONFIGURE_DEPENDS 能够可靠地工作，仍然需要对每个重建执行检查。

trans-unit.source: We don’t want to forget to install the MathFunctions.h header file with the install(FILES) command. The header file should be installed to the include directory, as specified by the target_include_directories() command above.

trans-unit.source: We don't want to forget to install the MathFunctions.h header file with the install(FILES) command. The header file should be installed to the include directory, as specified by the target_include_directories() command above.

We need to tell CMake that we want to use different include directories depending on if we’re building the library or using it from an installed location. If we don’t do this, when CMake creates the export information it will export a path that is specific to the current build directory and will not be valid for other projects. We can use generator expressions to specify that if we’re building the library include the current source directory. Otherwise, when installed, include the include directory. See the Creating Relocatable Packages section for more details.
trans-unit.target: 我们需要告诉CMake，我们要使用不同的包含目录，具体取决于我们是在构建库还是在已安装的位置使用它。如果我们不这样做，则当CMake创建导出信息时，它将导出特定于当前构建目录的路径，并且该路径对其他项目无效。我们可以使用 generator expressions 来指定是否在构建库时包括当前源目录。否则，在安装时，包括 include 目录。有关更多详细信息，请参见“创建可重定位软件包”部分。

trans-unit.source: We need to tell CMake that we want to use different include directories depending on if we're building the library or using it from an installed location. If we don't do this, when CMake creates the export information it will export a path that is specific to the current build directory and will not be valid for other projects. We can use generator expressions to specify that if we're building the library include the current source directory. Otherwise, when installed, include the include directory. See the Creating Relocatable Packages section for more details.

trans-unit.source: We will need to explicitly state in the CMake code that it should use the correct flags. The easiest way to enable support for a specific C++ standard in CMake is by using the CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD variable. For this tutorial, set the CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD variable in the CMakeLists.txt file to 11 and CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED to True. Make sure to add the CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD declarations above the call to add_executable.
trans-unit.target: 我们将需要在CMake代码中明确声明应使用正确的标志。在CMake中启用对特定C ++标准的支持的最简单方法是使用 CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 变量。对于本教程，将 CMakeLists.txt 文件中的 CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 变量设置为11，并将 CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED 设置为True。确保添加 CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 调用上述声明 add_executable 。

Welcome file to be embedded in the installer. It welcomes users to this installer. Typically used in the graphical installers on Windows and Mac OS X.

trans-unit.source: Well-behaved CMake-based buildsystems do not create any output in the source directory, so typically, the user performs an out-of-source build and performs the build there. First, CMake must be instructed to generate a suitable buildsystem, then the user invokes a build tool to process that generated buildsystem. The generated buildsystem is specific to the machine used to generate it and is not redistributable. Each consumer of a provided source software package is required to use CMake to generate a buildsystem specific to their system.
trans-unit.target: 乖巧的基于CMake的构建系统不会在源目录中创建任何输出,所以通常情况下,用户执行源外构建并在那里执行构建。首先,CMake必须被指示生成一个合适的构建系统,然后用户调用一个构建工具来处理这个生成的构建系统。生成的构建系统是特定于用于生成它的机器的,不可再分发。每个所提供的源码软件包的消费者都必须使用CMake来生成一个特定于他们系统的构建系统。

trans-unit.source: Were all of your specified components found?
trans-unit.target: 是否找到了你指定的所有组件?

trans-unit.source: What CMake generator should be used if the project is a CMake project. Defaults to the value of CMAKE_GENERATOR. Few users will want to change this setting.

trans-unit.source: What CMake is trying to say is that during generating the export information it will export a path that is intrinsically tied to the current machine and will not be valid on other machines. trans-unit.source: What type of dependency has the using project on that package. Default is OPTIONAL. In this case it is a package which can be used by the project when available at buildtime, but it also work without. RECOMMENDED is similar to OPTIONAL, i.e. the project will build if the package is not present, but the functionality of the resulting binaries will be severely limited. If a REQUIRED package is not available at buildtime, the project may not even build. This can be combined with the FATAL_ON_MISSING_REQUIRED_PACKAGES argument for feature_summary(). Last, a RUNTIME package is a package which is actually not used at all during the build, but which is required for actually running the resulting binaries. So if such a package is missing, the project can still be built, but it may not work later on. If set_package_properties() is called multiple times for the same package with different TYPEs, the TYPE is only changed to higher TYPEs (RUNTIME < OPTIONAL < RECOMMENDED < REQUIRED), lower TYPEs are ignored. The TYPE property is project-specific, so it cannot be set by the Find-module, but must be set in the project. Type accepted can be changed by setting the FeatureSummary_PKG_TYPES global property.
trans-unit.target: 该程序包的使用项目具有哪种类型的依赖项。默认为 OPTIONAL 。在这种情况下，它是一个在构建时可用的项目包，项目可以使用，但也可以不使用它。 RECOMMENDED 与 OPTIONAL 相似，即，如果不存在该程序包，则将构建项目，但是生成的二进制文件的功能将受到严重限制。如果 REQUIRED 包不能在生成时，该项目可能甚至没有建立。可以将其与 feature_summary() 的 FATAL_ON_MISSING_REQUIRED_PACKAGES 参数结合使用。最后，一个运行 RUNTIME 软件包是在构建过程中实际上根本不使用的软件包，但是实际运行生成的二进制文件是必需的。因此，如果缺少此类软件包，则仍可以构建项目，但以后可能无法正常工作。如果对具有不同TYPE的同一包多次调用 set_package_properties() ，则 TYPE 仅更改为较高的TYPE（ RUNTIME < OPTIONAL < RECOMMENDED < REQUIRED ），而较低的TYPE将被忽略。该 TYPE 属性是具体项目，所以它不能被查找模块进行设置，但必须在项目进行设置。可以通过设置 FeatureSummary_PKG_TYPES 全局属性来更改接受的类型。

trans-unit.source: When CMAKE_GLOBAL_AUTOGEN_TARGET is enabled, a custom target autogen is generated. This target depends on all AUTOMOC and AUTOUIC generated <ORIGIN>_autogen targets in the project. By building the global autogen target, all AUTOMOC and AUTOUIC files in the project will be generated.

trans-unit.target: 当CMake配置此头文件时， @Tutorial_VERSION_MAJOR@ 和 @Tutorial_VERSION_MINOR@ 将被替换。

trans-unit.source: When CMake is executed, it needs to find the locations of compilers, tools and dependencies. It also needs to be able to consistently re-generate a buildsystem to use the same compile/link flags and paths to dependencies. Such parameters are also required to be configurable by the user because they are paths and options specific to the users system.
trans-unit.target: 当CMake被执行时,它需要找到编译器、工具和依赖关系的位置。它还需要能够一致地重新生成一个构建系统,以使用相同的编译/链接标志和依赖项的路径。这种参数也需要用户可以配置,因为它们是用户系统特有的路径和选项。

trans-unit.source: When CMake is first run in an empty build tree, it creates a CMakeCache.txt file and populates it with customizable settings for the project. This option may be used to specify a file from which to load cache entries before the first pass through the project’s CMake listfiles. The loaded entries take priority over the project’s default values. The given file should be a CMake script containing set() commands that use the CACHE option, not a cache-format file.
trans-unit.target: 当CMake首次在空的构建树中运行时，它将创建 CMakeCache.txt 文件，并使用项目的可自定义设置填充该文件。此选项可用于指定在第一次通过项目的CMake列表文件之前从中加载缓存条目的文件。加载的条目优先于项目的默认值。给定的文件应该是包含使用 CACHE 选项的 set() 命令的CMake脚本，而不是缓存格式的文件。

trans-unit.source: When CMake is first run in an empty build tree, it creates a CMakeCache.txt file and populates it with customizable settings for the project. This option may be used to specify a file from which to load cache entries before the first pass through the project's CMake listfiles. The loaded entries take priority over the project's default values. The given file should be a CMake script containing set() commands that use the CACHE option, not a cache-format file.

When CMake is first run in an empty build tree, it creates a CMakeCache.txt file and populates it with customizable settings for the project. This option may be used to specify a setting that takes priority over the project’s default value. The option may be repeated for as many CACHE entries as desired.
trans-unit.target: 当CMake首次在空的构建树中运行时，它将创建 CMakeCache.txt 文件，并使用项目的可自定义设置填充该文件。此选项可用于指定优先于项目默认值的设置。可以根据需要对尽可能多的 CACHE 条目重复该选项。

trans-unit.source: When CMake is first run in an empty build tree, it creates a CMakeCache.txt file and populates it with customizable settings for the project. This option may be used to specify a setting that takes priority over the project's default value. The option may be repeated for as many CACHE entries as desired.

When CMake processes a project source tree, the entry point is a source file called CMakeLists.txt in the top-level source directory. This file may contain the entire build specification or use the add_subdirectory() command to add subdirectories to the build. Each subdirectory added by the command must also contain a CMakeLists.txt file as the entry point to that directory. For each source directory whose CMakeLists.txt file is processed CMake generates a corresponding directory in the build tree to act as the default working and output directory.
trans-unit.target: CMake处理项目源树时，入口点是顶级源目录中名为 CMakeLists.txt 的源文件。该文件可以包含整个构建规范，也可以使用 add_subdirectory() 命令将子目录添加到构建中。该命令添加的每个子目录还必须包含 CMakeLists.txt 文件，作为该目录的入口点。对于处理了 CMakeLists.txt 文件的每个源目录，CMake都会在构建树中生成一个相应的目录，以用作默认的工作和输出目录。

trans-unit.source: When CMake processes the CMakeLists.txt file, it will download and unpack the tarball into _deps/mycompany_toolchains-src relative to the build directory. The CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE variable is not used until the project() command is reached, at which point CMake looks for the named toolchain file relative to the build directory. Because the tarball has already been downloaded and unpacked by then, the toolchain file will be in place, even the very first time that cmake is run in the build directory.
trans-unit.target: CMake处理 CMakeLists.txt 文件时，它将下载压缩包并将其解压缩到相对于构建目录的 _deps/mycompany_toolchains-src 中。该 CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE 变量没有使用，直到 project() 达到命令，此时CMake的外观为命名工具链相对于生成目录文件。因为那时tarball已经下载并解压缩，所以工具链文件将就位，即使在构建目录中首次运行 cmake 时也是如此。

trans-unit.source: When CTest is asked to execute only a subset of tests (e.g. by the use of regular expressions or when run with the --rerun-failed command line option), it will automatically add any setup or cleanup tests for fixtures required by any of the tests that are in the execution set. This behavior can be overridden with the -FS, -FC and -FA command line options to ctest(1) if desired.
trans-unit.target: 当要求CTest仅执行测试的子集（例如通过使用正则表达式或使用 --rerun-failed 命令行选项运行）时，它将自动添加针对任何测试所需的固定装置的任何设置或清除测试。执行集中的测试。这种行为可以与被覆盖 -FS ， -FC 和 -FA 命令行选项来 ctest(1) 如果需要的话。

trans-unit.source: When CTest runs a test, the resources allocated to that test are passed in the form of a set of environment variables as described below. Using this information to decide which resource to connect to is left to the test writer.
trans-unit.target: 当CTest运行测试时，分配给该测试的资源以一组环境变量的形式传递，如下所述。使用此信息来确定要连接到哪个资源留给测试编写器。

trans-unit.source: When CTest sets the environment variables for a test, it assigns a group number based on the group description, starting at 0 on the left and the number of groups minus 1 on the right. For example, in the example above, the two groups in the first description would have IDs of 0 and 1, and the single group in the second description would have an ID of 2.
trans-unit.target: 当CTest设置测试的环境变量时，它将根据组描述分配一个组号，从左侧的0开始，从右侧的组数减去1开始。例如，在上面的示例中，第一个描述中的两个组的ID为0和1，第二个描述中的单个组的ID为2。

trans-unit.source: When a <min> version higher than 2.4 is specified the command implicitly invokes
trans-unit.target: 当指定的 <min> 版本高于2.4时，该命令会隐式调用

trans-unit.source: When a COMPONENT option is given, the listed <component> implicitly depends on all components mentioned in the export set. The exported <name>.cmake file will require each of the exported components to be present in order for dependent projects to build properly. For example, a project may define components Runtime and Development, with shared libraries going into the Runtime component and static libraries and headers going into the Development component. The export set would also typically be part of the Development component, but it would export targets from both the Runtime and Development components. Therefore, the Runtime component would need to be installed if the Development component was installed, but not vice versa. If the Development component was installed without the Runtime component, dependent projects that try to link against it would have build errors. Package managers, such as APT and RPM, typically handle this by listing the Runtime component as a dependency of the Development component in the package metadata, ensuring that the library is always installed if the headers and CMake export file are present.
trans-unit.target: 当 COMPONENT 选项，则所列出的 <component> 隐式地依赖于出口集提到的所有部件。导出的 <name>.cmake 文件将要求每个导出的组件都存在，以便从属项目正确构建。例如，一个项目可以定义组件 Runtime 和 Development ，共享库进入 Runtime 组件，而静态库和标头进入 Development 组件。导出集通常也将是 Development 组件的一部分，但是它将从 Runtime 和 Development 导出目标组件。因此，如果安装了 Development 组件，则需要安装 Runtime 组件，反之则不然。如果安装的 Development 组件没有 Runtime 组件，则尝试链接到该组件的相关项目将产生构建错误。程序包管理器（例如APT和RPM）通常通过在包元数据中将 Runtime 组件作为 Development 组件的依赖项列出来进行处理，以确保如果存在标头和CMake导出文件，则始终安装该库。

trans-unit.source: When a VERSION <major>[.<minor>[.<patch>[.<tweak>]]]] argument is given to the project() command, it stores the version string in the PROJECT_VERSION variable and stores individual integer version components in PROJECT_VERSION_{MAJOR,MINOR,PATCH,TWEAK} variables (see policy CMP0048). CMake 3.15 and below dropped leading zeros from each component. CMake 3.16 and higher prefer to preserve leading zeros. This policy provides compatibility for projects that have not been updated to expect the new behavior.
trans-unit.target: 当将 VERSION <major>[.<minor>[.<patch>[.<tweak>]]]] 参数提供给 project() 命令时，它将版本字符串存储在 PROJECT_VERSION 变量中，并存储各个整数版本组件在 PROJECT_VERSION_{MAJOR,MINOR,PATCH,TWEAK} 变量中（请参阅策略 CMP0048 ）。 CMake 3.15及以下版本从每个组件中删除前导零。 CMake 3.16和更高版本更喜欢保留前导零。该策略为尚未更新的项目提供兼容性，以防止出现新的行为。

trans-unit.source: When a custom fetch script fails to fetch the requested content, it must set this variable to a short one-line message describing the reason for failure.
trans-unit.target: 当一个自定义的fetch脚本无法获取所请求的内容时,它必须将这个变量设置为一个描述失败原因的简短单行消息。

trans-unit.source: When a custom fetch script is loaded, this variable is set to the full path to a file in which the script must store the fetched content. The name of the file is unspecified and should not be interpreted in any way.
trans-unit.target: 当一个自定义的获取脚本被加载时,这个变量被设置为一个文件的完整路径,脚本必须在这个文件中存储获取的内容。文件的名称是未指定的,不应该以任何方式解释。

trans-unit.source: When a custom fetch script is loaded, this variable is set to the location part of the URL, which will contain the substituted hash algorithm name and content hash value.
trans-unit.target: 当加载自定义的获取脚本时,这个变量被设置为URL的位置部分,其中将包含替换的哈希算法名称和内容哈希值。

trans-unit.source: When a data file must be fetched from one of the URL templates specified in the ExternalData_URL_TEMPLATES variable, it is normally downloaded using the file(DOWNLOAD) command. One may specify usage of a custom fetch script by using a URL template of the form ExternalDataCustomScript://<key>/<loc>. The <key> must be a C identifier, and the <loc> must contain the %(algo) and %(hash) placeholders. A variable corresponding to the key, ExternalData_CUSTOM_SCRIPT_<key>, must be set to the full path to a .cmake script file. The script will be included to perform the actual fetch, and provided with the following variables:
trans-unit.target: 当必须从 ExternalData_URL_TEMPLATES 变量中指定的URL模板之一中获取数据文件时，通常使用 file(DOWNLOAD) 命令下载该文件。可以通过使用形式 ExternalDataCustomScript://<key>/<loc> 的URL模板来指定自定义提取脚本的用法。所述 <key> 必须是一个C标识符，并且 <loc> 必须包含 %(algo) 和 %(hash) 占位符。必须将与键 ExternalData_CUSTOM_SCRIPT_<key> 对应的变量设置为 .cmake 的完整路径。脚本文件。该脚本将包括在内以执行实际的提取，并提供以下变量：

trans-unit.source: When a device link step is involved, which is controlled by CUDA_SEPARABLE_COMPILATION and CUDA_RESOLVE_DEVICE_SYMBOLS properties and policy CMP0105, the raw options will be delivered to the host and device link steps (wrapped in -Xcompiler or equivalent for device link). Options wrapped with $<DEVICE_LINK:...>generator expression will be used only for the device link step. Options wrapped with $<HOST_LINK:...>generator expression will be used only for the host link step.
trans-unit.target: 当涉及到设备链接步骤（由 CUDA_SEPARABLE_COMPILATION 和 CUDA_RESOLVE_DEVICE_SYMBOLS 属性和策略 CMP0105 控制)时，原始选项将传递到主机和设备链接步骤（包装在 -Xcompiler 中或等效于设备链接）。用 $<DEVICE_LINK:...> generator expression 包装的选项将仅用于设备链接步骤。用 $<HOST_LINK:...> generator expression 包装的选项将仅用于主机链接步骤。

trans-unit.source: When a framework target is created its FRAMEWORK_MULTI_CONFIG_POSTFIX_<CONFIG> target property is initialized with the value of this variable if it is set.
trans-unit.target: 创建 FRAMEWORK_MULTI_CONFIG_POSTFIX_<CONFIG> 目标时，将使用此变量的值（如果已设置）初始化其FRAMEWORK_MULTI_CONFIG_POSTFIX_ <CONFIG>目标属性。

trans-unit.source: When a generated file created as the OUTPUT of an add_custom_command() command is explicitly listed as a source file for any target in the same directory scope (which usually means the same CMakeLists.txt file), CMake will automatically create a dependency to make sure the file is generated before building that target.
trans-unit.target: 当生成的文件作为所创建的 OUTPUT 一个的 add_custom_command() 命令被明确列出作为用于在相同的目录范围的任何目标源文件（这通常意味着同样 CMakeLists.txt 文件），CMake的自动创建依赖，以确保该文件是在建立该目标之前生成的。

trans-unit.source: When a generated file created by an add_custom_command() command is explicitly listed as a source file for any target in the same directory scope (which usually means the same CMakeLists.txt file), CMake will automatically create a dependency to make sure the file is generated before building that target.
trans-unit.target: 当将由 add_custom_command() 命令创建的生成文件明确列出为同一目录范围内的任何目标的源文件（通常意味着相同的 CMakeLists.txt 文件）时，CMake将自动创建依赖项以确保该文件为在建立目标之前生成。

trans-unit.source: When a language is enabled, CMake finds a compiler for that language, and determines some information, such as the vendor and version of the compiler, the target architecture and bitwidth, the location of corresponding utilities etc.
trans-unit.target: 当一种语言被启用后,CMake会找到该语言的编译器,并确定一些信息,如编译器的厂商和版本、目标架构和位宽、相应实用程序的位置等。

trans-unit.source: When a macro is invoked, the commands recorded in the macro are first modified by replacing formal parameters (${arg1}, …) with the arguments passed, and then invoked as normal commands.
trans-unit.target: 调用宏时，首先通过用传递的参数替换形式参数（ ${arg1} ，…）来修改宏中记录的命令，然后将其作为普通命令来调用。

trans-unit.source: When a macro is invoked, the commands recorded in the macro are first modified by replacing formal parameters (${arg1}, ...) with the arguments passed, and then invoked as normal commands.
When a non-executable target is created its <CONFIG>_POSTFIX target property is initialized with the value of this variable if it is set.
trans-unit.target: 创建不可执行的目标时，如果已设置此变量的值，则其 <CONFIG>_POSTFIX 目标属性将被初始化。

trans-unit.source: When a regular expression match is used, CMake fills in CMAKE_MATCH_<n> variables with the match contents. The CMAKE_MATCH_COUNT variable holds the number of match expressions when these are filled.
trans-unit.target: 当使用正则表达式匹配时，CMake将匹配内容填充到 CMAKE_MATCH_<n> 变量中。匹配时， CMAKE_MATCH_COUNT 变量保存匹配表达式的数量。

trans-unit.source: When a regular expression match is used, CMake fills in CMAKE_MATCH_<n> variables with the match contents. The CMAKE_MATCH_COUNT variable holds the number of match expressions when these are filled.
trans-unit.target: 当使用正则表达式匹配时，CMake将匹配内容填充到 CMAKE_MATCH_<n> 变量中。匹配时， CMAKE_MATCH_COUNT 变量保存匹配表达式的数量。

trans-unit.source: When a target is being installed, CMake may need to rewrite its rpath information. This occurs when the install rpath (as specified by the INSTALL_RPATH target property) has different contents to the rpath that the target was built with. Some toolchains insert their own rpath contents into the binary as part of the build. By default, CMake will preserve those extra inserted contents in the install rpath. For those scenarios where such toolchain-inserted entries need to be discarded during install, set the INSTALL_REMOVE_ENVIRONMENT_RPATH target property to true.
trans-unit.target: 在安装目标时，CMake可能需要重写其rpath信息。当安装rpath（由 INSTALL_RPATH 目标属性指定）与构建目标的rpath具有不同的内容时，会发生这种情况。一些工具链将自己的rpath内容插入到二进制文件中，作为构建的一部分。默认情况下，CMake将在安装rpath中保留那些额外插入的内容。对于在安装过程中需要丢弃此类插入了工具链的条目的情况，请将 INSTALL_REMOVE_ENVIRONMENT_RPATH 目标属性设置为true。

trans-unit.source: When a third-party utility’s source is included in the distribution, this command specifies its location and name. The cache entry will not be set unless the path_to_source and all listed files exist. It is assumed that the source tree of the utility will have been built before it is needed.
trans-unit.target: 当分发中包含第三方实用程序的源时，此命令将指定其位置和名称。除非 path_to_source 和所有列出的文件存在，否则将不会设置缓存条目。假定该实用程序的源树将在需要之前已构建。

trans-unit.source: When a third-party utility's source is included in the distribution, this command specifies its location and name. The cache entry will not be set unless the path_to_source and all listed files exist. It is assumed that the source tree of the utility will have been built before it is needed.

When a variable of this form is set to false, it indicates that the relevant wrapping command should not be used. The wrapping command depends on the module, it may be implied by the module name or it might be specified by the YY part of the variable.
When a version is requested, it can be specified as a simple value or as a range. For a detailed description of version range usage and capabilities, refer to the find_package() command.
trans-unit.target: 请求版本时，可以将其指定为简单值或范围。有关版本范围用法和功能的详细说明，请参考 find_package() 命令。

trans-unit.source: When a version is requested, it can be specified as a simple value or as a range. For a detailed description of version range usage and capabilities, refer to the find_package() command.
trans-unit.target: 请求版本时，可以将其指定为简单值或范围。有关版本范围用法和功能的详细说明，请参考 find_package() 命令。

trans-unit.source: When a version range is specified, the above version variables will hold values based on the lower end of the version range. This is to preserve compatibility with packages that have not been implemented to expect version ranges. In addition, the version range will be described by the following variables:
trans-unit.target: 当指定了版本范围时,上述版本变量将根据版本范围的下限来取值。这是为了保持与那些没有实现版本范围的软件包的兼容性。此外,版本范围将由以下变量来描述。

trans-unit.source: When all items on the link line have known paths CMake does not check this policy so it has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 当链接线上的所有项目都有已知的路径时,CMake不会检查这个策略,所以它没有效果。

trans-unit.source: When an ELF binary needs to have a different RPATH after installation than it does in the build tree, CMake uses a builtin editor to change the RPATH in the installed copy. If this variable is set to true then CMake will relink the binary before installation instead of using its builtin editor.
trans-unit.target: 当一个ELF二进制文件在安装后需要一个不同于它在构建树中的RPATH时,CMake使用一个内置的编辑器来改变安装副本中的RPATH。如果这个变量被设置为true,那么CMake将在安装前重新链接二进制文件,而不是使用它的内置编辑器。

trans-unit.source: When an artifact is specified, all HINTS will be ignored and no search will be performed for this artifact.
trans-unit.target: 指定工件后，将忽略所有 HINTS 并且不会对此工件进行搜索。

trans-unit.source: When an intermediate file generated during the build is consumed by an expensive operation or a large tree of dependents, one may reduce the work needed for an incremental rebuild by updating the file timestamp only when its content changes. With this approach the generation rule must have a separate output file that is always updated with a new timestamp that is newer than any dependencies of the rule so that the build tool re-runs the rule only when the input changes. We refer to the separate output file as a rule’s witness and the generated file as a rule’s byproduct.
trans-unit.target: 当在构建过程中生成的中间文件被昂贵的操作或大量依赖项所占用时，仅当文件内容更改时，才通过更新文件时间戳来减少增量重建所需的工作。使用这种方法，生成规则必须具有一个单独的输出文件，该文件始终使用比该规则的任何依赖项都新的新时间戳进行更新，以便构建工具仅在输入发生更改时才重新运行该规则。我们将单独的输出文件称为规则的见证人，并将生成的文件称为规则的副产品。

trans-unit.source: When an intermediate file generated during the build is consumed by an expensive operation or a large tree of dependents, one may reduce the work needed for an incremental rebuild by updating the file timestamp only when its content changes. With this approach the generation rule must have a separate output file that is always updated with a new timestamp that is newer than any dependencies of the rule so that the build tool re-runs the rule only when the input changes. We refer to the separate output file as a rule's witness and the generated file as a rule's byproduct.

When any Xcode variable or CMAKE_CFG_INTDIR is used, CMake is not able to fully evaluate the path(s) at configure time. One consequence of this is that the configuration-specific IMPORTED_OBJECTS_<CONFIG> properties cannot be used, since CMake cannot determine whether an object file exists at a particular <CONFIG> location. The IMPORTED_OBJECTS property must be used for these situations and the configuration-specific aspects of the path must be handled by using CMAKE_CFG_INTDIR or with another Xcode variable $(CONFIGURATION).
When both -R and -I are specified by default the intersection of tests are run. By specifying -U the union of tests is run instead.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，当同时指定 -R 和 -I 时，将运行测试的交集。通过指定 -U ,将改为运行测试联合。

trans-unit.source: When building the complete GNU system, the prefix will be empty and /usr will be a symbolic link to /.
trans-unit.target: 在构建完整的GNU系统，前缀是空的，并 /usr 将是一个符号链接 / 。

trans-unit.source: When building the package, specify each Foo_LIBRARY cache entry as just a library name, e.g. -DFoo_LIBRARY=foo. This tells the corresponding find module to populate the Foo_LIBRARIES with just foo to ask the linker to search for the library instead of hard-coding a path.
trans-unit.target: 构建程序包时，将每个 Foo_LIBRARY 缓存条目仅指定为库名，例如 -DFoo_LIBRARY=foo 。这告诉相应的find模块仅用 foo 填充 Foo_LIBRARIES ，以要求链接程序搜索该库，而不是对路径进行硬编码。

trans-unit.source: When building with configuration <CONFIG> the value of this property is appended to the target file name built on disk. For non-executable targets, this property is initialized by the value of the variable CMAKE_<CONFIG>_POSTFIX if it is set when a target is created. This property is ignored on the Mac for Frameworks and App Bundles.
trans-unit.target: 使用配置<CONFIG>构建时，此属性的值将附加到在磁盘上构建的目标文件名。对于不可执行的目标，如果在创建目标时设置了该属性，则通过变量CMAKE_ <CONFIG> _POSTFIX的值来初始化此属性。在Mac上的Frameworks和App Bundles中，此属性被忽略。

trans-unit.source: When building with configuration <CONFIG> the value of this property is appended to the framework file name built on disk.
trans-unit.target: 使用配置 <CONFIG> 进行构建时，此属性的值将附加到在磁盘上构建的框架文件名中。

trans-unit.source: When choosing a Visual Studio generator, further options are available to set an architecture to generate for.
trans-unit.target: 在选择Visual Studio生成器时,还有更多选项可以设置生成的架构。

trans-unit.source: When compiling with MSVC, if this cache variable is set the protobuf-default VS project build locations (vsprojects/Debug and vsprojects/Release or vsprojects/x64/Debug and vsprojects/x64/Release) will be searched for libraries and binaries.
trans-unit.target: 当使用MSVC编译时,如果设置了这个缓存变量,那么protobuf-default VS项目的构建位置(vsprojects/Debug和vsprojects/Release或vsprojects/x64/Debug和vsprojects/x64/Release)将被搜索库和二进制文件。

trans-unit.source: When configuring for any of the embedded platforms, one can target either real devices or the simulator. Both have their own separate SDK, but CMake only supports specifying a single SDK for the configuration phase. This means the developer must select one or the other at configuration time. When using the Xcode generator, this is less of a limitation because Xcode still allows you to build for either a device or a simulator, even though configuration was only performed for one of the two. From within the Xcode IDE, builds are performed for the selected “destination” platform. When building from the command line, the desired sdk can be specified directly by passing a -sdk option to the underlying build tool (xcodebuild). For example:
trans-unit.target: 在为任何嵌入式平台进行配置时，可以针对真实设备或模拟器。两者都有各自独立的SDK，但是CMake仅支持在配置阶段指定一个SDK。这意味着开发人员必须在配置时选择一个或另一个。使用 Xcode 生成器时，这没有什么限制，因为Xcode仍然允许您为设备或模拟器进行构建，即使仅针对两者之一进行了配置。在Xcode IDE中，将为选定的“目标”平台执行构建。从命令行构建时，可以通过将 -sdk 选项传递给基础构建工具（ xcodebuild ）直接指定所需的sdk 。例如：

trans-unit.source: When configuring for any of the embedded platforms, one can target either real devices or the simulator. Both have their own separate SDK, but CMake only supports specifying a single SDK for the configuration phase. This means the developer must select one or the other at configuration time. When using the Xcode generator, this is less of a limitation because Xcode still allows you to build for either a device or a simulator, even though configuration was only performed for one of the two. From within the Xcode IDE, builds are performed for the selected “destination” platform. When building from the command line, the desired sdk can be specified directly by passing a -sdk option to the underlying build tool (xcodebuild). For example:

trans-unit.source: When configuring for any of the embedded platforms, one can target either real devices or the simulator. Both have their own separate SDK, but CMake only supports specifying a single SDK for the configuration phase. This means the developer must select one or the other at configuration time. When using the Xcode generator, this is less of a limitation because Xcode still allows you to build for either a device or a simulator, even though configuration was only performed for one of the two. From within the Xcode IDE, builds are performed for the selected "destination" platform. When building from the command line, the desired sdk can be specified directly by passing a -sdk option to the underlying build tool (xcodebuild). For example:
When connecting to the server (via named pipe or by starting it in --debug mode), the server will reply with a hello message:
trans-unit.target: 当连接到服务器（通过命名管道或以 --debug 模式启动）时，服务器将回复问候消息：

trans-unit.source: When cross compiling CMake will print a warning if a utility_source() command is executed, because in many cases it is used to build an executable which is executed later on. This doesn’t work when cross compiling, since the executable can run only on their target platform. So in this case the cache entry has to be adjusted manually so it points to an executable which is runnable on the build host.
trans-unit.target: 交叉编译时，如果执行 utility_source() 命令，CMake将显示警告，因为在许多情况下，它用于构建可执行文件，稍后再执行。在交叉编译时，这不起作用，因为可执行文件只能在其目标平台上运行。因此，在这种情况下，必须手动调整缓存条目，以便它指向可在构建主机上运行的可执行文件。

trans-unit.source: When cross compiling CMake will print a warning if a utility_source() command is executed, because in many cases it is used to build an executable which is executed later on. This doesn't work when cross compiling, since the executable can run only on their target platform. So in this case the cache entry has to be adjusted manually so it points to an executable which is runnable on the build host.

When cross compiling for windows with clang-cl, this variable can be an absolute path pointing to a clang virtual file system yaml file, which will enable clang-cl to resolve windows header names on a case sensitive file system.
trans-unit.target: 当用clang-cl交叉编译windows时,这个变量可以是指向clang虚拟文件系统yaml文件的绝对路径,这将使clang-cl在大小写敏感的文件系统上解析windows头名。

trans-unit.source: When cross compiling, the executable compiled in the first step usually cannot be run on the build host. The try_run command checks the CMAKE_CROSSCOMPILING variable to detect whether CMake is in cross-compiling mode. If that is the case, it will still try to compile the executable, but it will not try to run the executable unless the CMAKE_CROSSCOMPILING_EMULATOR variable is set. Instead it will create cache variables which must be filled by the user or by presetting them in some CMake script file to the values the executable would have produced if it had been run on its actual target platform. These cache entries are:
trans-unit.target: 交叉编译时，通常无法在构建主机上运行第一步中编译的可执行文件。所述 try_run 命令检查 CMAKE_CROSSCOMPILING 变量检测CMake的是否处于交叉编译模式。在这种情况下，它将仍然尝试编译可执行文件，但是除非设置了 CMAKE_CROSSCOMPILING_EMULATOR 变量，否则它将不会尝试运行可执行文件。取而代之的是，它将创建缓存变量，这些变量必须由用户填充，或者通过在某些CMake脚本文件中将其预先设置为可执行文件（如果该可执行文件已在其实际目标平台上运行）所产生的值来填充。这些缓存条目是：

trans-unit.source: When cross-compiling, a CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE should set the CMAKE_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR variable to match target architecture that it specifies (via CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER and perhaps CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_TARGET).
When cross-compiling, some platforms may require environment variables to be set or may provide scripts to set the environment.
trans-unit.target: 在交叉编译时,有些平台可能需要设置环境变量,或者可能提供脚本来设置环境。

trans-unit.source: When defining the interface of a target for EXPORT, keep in mind that the include directories should be specified as relative paths to the CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX but should not explicitly include the CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX:
trans-unit.target: 在定义 EXPORT 目标的接口时，请记住，应该将include目录指定为 CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX 的相对路径，但不应明确包括 CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX ：

trans-unit.source: When done, cmake_parse_arguments will consider for each of the keywords listed in <options>, <one_value_keywords> and <multi_value_keywords> a variable composed of the given <prefix> followed by "_" and the name of the respective keyword. These variables will then hold the respective value from the argument list or be undefined if the associated option could not be found. For the <options> keywords, these will always be defined, to TRUE or FALSE, whether the option is in the argument list or not.
trans-unit.target: 完成后， cmake_parse_arguments 将为 <options> ， <one_value_keywords> 和 <multi_value_keywords> 中列出的每个关键字考虑一个变量，该变量由给定的 <prefix> 后跟 "_" 和相应关键字的名称组成。然后，这些变量将从参数列表中保存相应的值；如果找不到关联的选项，则这些变量将是未定义的。对于 <options> 关键字，无论选项是否在参数列表中，它们始终将定义为 TRUE 或 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: When enabled by the cmake--log-context command line option or the CMAKE_MESSAGE_CONTEXT_SHOW variable, the message() command converts the CMAKE_MESSAGE_CONTEXT list into a dot-separated string surrounded by square brackets and prepends it to each line for messages of log levels NOTICE and below.
trans-unit.target: 当通过 cmake --log-context 命令行选项或 CMAKE_MESSAGE_CONTEXT_SHOW 变量启用时， message() 命令将 CMAKE_MESSAGE_CONTEXT 列表转换为以点分隔的字符串，并用方括号括起来，并在每行前添加日志级别 NOTICE 和下面。

trans-unit.source: When enabled the static version of the CUDA runtime library will be used in CUDA_LIBRARIES. If the version of CUDA configured doesn't support this option, then it will be silently disabled.
When enabled, stdout and stderr will be merged for any step whose output is being logged to files.
trans-unit.target: 当启用时,任何输出被记录到文件的步骤,stdout和stderr将被合并。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, the generated Makefiles will produce colored output. Default is ON.
trans-unit.target: 启用后，生成的Makefile将产生彩色输出。默认值为 ON 。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, the output of the build step is logged to files.
trans-unit.target: 启用后,构建步骤的输出会被记录到文件中。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, the output of the configure step is logged to files.
trans-unit.target: 启用后,配置步骤的输出将被记录到文件中。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, the output of the download step is logged to files.
trans-unit.target: 启用后,下载步骤的输出会被记录到文件中。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, the output of the install step is logged to files.
trans-unit.target: 启用后,安装步骤的输出将被记录到文件中。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, the output of the patch step is logged to files.
trans-unit.target: 启用后,补丁步骤的输出将被记录到文件中。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, the output of the test step is logged to files.
trans-unit.target: 启用后,测试步骤的输出被记录到文件中。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, the output of the update step is logged to files.
trans-unit.target: 启用后,更新步骤的输出将被记录到文件中。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, this option causes the update step to be skipped. It does not, however, prevent the download step. The update step can still be added as a step target (see ExternalProject_Add_StepTargets()) and called manually. This is useful if you want to allow developers to build the project when disconnected from the network (the network may still be needed for the download step though).
trans-unit.target: 启用后，此选项将导致跳过更新步骤。但是，它不会阻止下载步骤。仍然可以将更新步骤添加为步骤目标（请参阅 ExternalProject_Add_StepTargets() ）并手动调用。如果要允许开发人员在与网络断开连接时构建项目，则此功能很有用（尽管下载步骤可能仍需要网络）。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, this option excludes the external project from the default ALL target of the main build.
trans-unit.target: 启用后,该选项将外部项目从主构建的默认ALL目标中排除。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, this option instructs the git clone operation to report its progress by passing it the --progress option. Without this option, the clone step for large projects may appear to make the build stall, since nothing will be logged until the clone operation finishes. While this option can be used to provide progress to prevent the appearance of the build having stalled, it may also make the build overly noisy if lots of external projects are used.
trans-unit.target: 启用后，此选项通过将 --progress 选项传递给 git clone 操作来报告其进度。如果没有此选项，则大型项目的克隆步骤可能会使构建停滞，因为在克隆操作完成之前不会记录任何内容。尽管可以使用此选项来提供进度以防止构建的外观停滞，但是如果使用了大量的外部项目，也可能使构建过于嘈杂。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, this option specifies that the custom step should always be run (i.e. that it is always considered out of date).
trans-unit.target: 当启用时,该选项指定自定义步骤应始终运行(即它始终被认为是过时的)。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, this option specifies that the external project’s main target does not depend on the custom step.
trans-unit.target: 启用后，此选项指定外部项目的主要目标不依赖于自定义步骤。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, this option specifies that the external project’s main target does not depend on the custom step. This may cause step targets to be created automatically for the steps on which this step depends. See policy CMP0114.
trans-unit.target: 启用后，此选项指定外部项目的主要目标不依赖于自定义步骤。这可能会导致为该步骤所依赖的步骤自动创建步骤目标。请参阅策略 CMP0114 。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, this option specifies that the external project's main target does not depend on the custom step. This may cause step targets to be created automatically for the steps on which this step depends. See policy CMP0114.

When evaluating Variable References, CMake first searches the function call stack, if any, for a binding and then falls back to the binding in the current directory scope, if any. If a "set" binding is found, its value is used. If an "unset" binding is found, or no binding is found, CMake then searches for a cache entry. If a cache entry is found, its value is used. Otherwise, the variable reference evaluates to an empty string. The $CACHE{VAR} syntax can be used to do direct cache entry lookups.

When evaluating Variable References, CMake first searches the function call stack, if any, for a binding and then falls back to the binding in the current directory scope, if any. If a “set” binding is found, its value is used. If an “unset” binding is found, or no binding is found, CMake then searches for a cache entry. If a cache entry is found, its value is used. Otherwise, the variable reference evaluates to an empty string. The $CACHE{VAR} syntax can be used to do direct cache entry lookups.
trans-unit.target: 在评估变量引用时，CMake首先在函数调用堆栈（如果有）中搜索绑定，然后回退到当前目录范围（如果有）中的绑定。如果找到“设置”绑定，则使用其值。如果找到“未设置”绑定，或者没有找到绑定，则CMake然后搜索缓存条目。如果找到缓存条目，则使用其值。否则，变量引用将计算为空字符串。在 $CACHE{VAR} 语法可以用来做直接缓存条目查找。

trans-unit.source: When evaluating Variable References of the form ${VAR}, CMake first searches for a normal variable with that name, and if not found CMake will search for a cache entry with that name. The $CACHE{VAR} syntax can be used to do direct cache lookup and ignore any existing normal variable.
trans-unit.target: 当评估形式 ${VAR} 变量引用时，CMake首先搜索具有该名称的普通变量，如果找不到，则CMake将搜索具有该名称的缓存条目。在 $CACHE{VAR} 语法可以用来做直接缓存查找和忽略任何现有的普通变量。

trans-unit.source: When executing code inside a function(), this variable contains the full directory of the listfile that defined the current function.
trans-unit.target: 在 function() 中执行代码时，此变量包含定义当前函数的列表文件的完整目录。

trans-unit.source: When executing code inside a function(), this variable contains the full path to the listfile that defined the current function.
trans-unit.target: 在 function() 中执行代码时，此变量包含定义当前函数的列表文件的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: When executing code inside a function(), this variable contains the line number in the listfile where the current function was defined.
trans-unit.target: 在 function() 中执行代码时，此变量包含列表文件中定义当前功能的行号。

trans-unit.source: When executing code inside a function(), this variable contains the name of the current function. It can be useful for diagnostic or debug messages.
trans-unit.target: 在 function() 中执行代码时，此变量包含当前函数的名称。它对于诊断或调试消息很有用。

trans-unit.source: When generating Visual Studio project and solutions files several other options are available to use when initially running cmake(1).
trans-unit.target: 生成Visual Studio项目和解决方案文件时，最初运行 cmake(1) 时可以使用其他几个选项。

trans-unit.source: When generating for Visual Studio 9 2008 or greater with the Intel Fortran plugin installed, this specifies the .vfproj project file format version. This is intended for internal use by CMake and should not be used by project code.
trans-unit.target: 为安装了Intel Fortran插件的 Visual Studio 9 2008 或更高版本生成时，这将指定 .vfproj 项目文件格式版本。这仅供CMake内部使用，不应由项目代码使用。

trans-unit.source: When generating for Visual Studio 9 2008 or greater with the Intel Fortran plugin installed, this specifies the .vfproj project file format version. This is intended for internal use by CMake and should not be used by project code.
trans-unit.target: 为安装了Intel Fortran插件的 Visual Studio 9 2008 或更高版本生成时，这将指定 .vfproj 项目文件格式版本。这仅供CMake内部使用，不应由项目代码使用。

trans-unit.source: When generating for Visual Studio 9 2008 or greater with the Intel Fortran plugin installed, this specifies the .vfproj project file format version. This is intended for internal use by CMake and should not be used by project code.
When in this mode CMake determines which files are grouped together. The UNITY_BUILD_BATCH_SIZE property controls the upper limit on how many sources can be combined per unity source file.
trans-unit.target: 在此模式下，CMake确定将哪些文件分组在一起。所述 UNITY_BUILD_BATCH_SIZE 属性控制多少源可以每统一源文件被组合的上限。

trans-unit.source: When in this mode each target explicitly specifies how to group source files. Each source file that has the same UNITY_GROUP value will be grouped together. Any sources that don’t have this property will be compiled individually. The UNITY_BUILD_BATCH_SIZE property is ignored when using this mode.
trans-unit.target: 在此模式下，每个目标都明确指定如何对源文件进行分组。具有相同 UNITY_GROUP 值的每个源文件将被分组在一起。没有此属性的任何源将被单独编译。该 UNITY_BUILD_BATCH_SIZE 属性使用此模式时忽略。

trans-unit.source: When in this mode each target explicitly specifies how to group source files. Each source file that has the same UNITY_GROUP value will be grouped together. Any sources that don't have this property will be compiled individually. The UNITY_BUILD_BATCH_SIZE property is ignored when using this mode.
When invoked, this cmake --build command line will launch the underlying build system tool.
trans-unit.target: 当调用时，此 cmake --build 命令行将启动基础的构建系统工具。

trans-unit.source: When invoking cmake(1) with a command line buildsystem such as Makefiles or Ninja, it is necessary to use the correct build environment to ensure that build tools are available. CMake must be able to find the appropriate build tool, compiler, linker and other tools as needed.
trans-unit.target: 在使用诸如 Makefiles 或 Ninja 之类的命令行构建系统调用 cmake(1) 时，必须使用正确的构建环境以确保可用的构建工具。CMake必须能够根据需要找到适当的 build tool ，编译器，链接器和其他工具。
